LanguageData.SkavenStart.label: skaven research bench
LanguageData.SkavenStart.description: Start the journey into skaven tech.
LanguageData.SkavenWeaponsOne.label: crossbows
LanguageData.SkavenWeaponsTwo.label: heavy melee weapons
LanguageData.SkavenCloth.label: cloth gear
LanguageData.SkavenCloth.description: Low tier skaven gear. Hood, tunic and cloth.
LanguageData.SkavenArmour.label: armour gear
LanguageData.SkavenArmour.description: Mid tier skaven gear. Padded armour, helmet and robe.
LanguageData.SkavenHeavyArmour.label: heavy armour gear
LanguageData.SkavenHeavyWeapon.label: experimental weaponry
LanguageData.SkavenHeavyWeapon.description: Unlocks the ratling gun, posion hose, poison bottle, chemical mortar and the poison mine.
LanguageData.SkavenWarpLightning.label: warp-lightning
LanguageData.SkavenWarpLightning.description: Unlocks manable warp-lightning turrets and warpstone battery.
LanguageData.SkavenMountedGuns.label: warplock weaponry
LanguageData.SkavenMountedGuns.description: Unlocks manable Warplock Jezzail and Warplock pistol.
LanguageData.SkavenMoulderBase.label: Moulder tech
LanguageData.SkavenMoulderBase.description: Unlocks the Moulder work bench. Allows one to start extracting skaven blood for further bio-engineering
LanguageData.SkavenMoulderGear.label: Moulder gear
LanguageData.SkavenMoulderGear.description: Unlocks clan Moulder gear. This gear will allow for easier handling of beasts. Pack armour, cage mask and shock-prod.
LanguageData.SkavenMoulderBio.label: Moulder bio-engineering
LanguageData.SkavenMoulderBio.description: Unlocks the basic Moulder bio-engineering recipes. Allows for crafting of warp-infused blood and creating wolf rats from various canines.
LanguageData.SkavenMoulderBioAdvanced.label: Advanced bio-engineering
LanguageData.SkavenMoulderBioAdvanced.description: Unlocks the advanced Moulder bio-engineering recipes. Allows for crafting of mixed blood and ogre operations.
LanguageData.SkavenMoulderProsthetic.label: Moulder prosthetic
